title: Kwasi Kwarteng – 2021 Comments on Funding for Decarbonisation
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kwasi Kwarteng, the Energy Minister, on 2 January 2021.
content:
The UK is leading the world’s green industrial revolution, with ambitious targets to decarbonise our economy and create hundreds of thousands of jobs.
